explains: adv. 现实地；实际地；逼真地

sentences.en: How many can you realistically hope to sell?
sentences.cn: 实事求是地讲，你希望能卖出多少？

sentences.en: Realistically, there is little prospect of a ceasefire.
sentences.cn: 实事求是地讲，停火的希望很渺茫。

sentences.en: In the case of a major collection, there are probably more works on display than we could realistically view in weeks or even months.
sentences.cn: 在主要的收藏中，展出的作品可能比我们在几周甚至几个月内实际看到的还要多。
